p.codeblock: public abstract int setSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx(int[] uidList, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int setSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int SetSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx(TArray<int64> uidList, int uidNumber, const FRtcConnection& connection);
public abstract int SetSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx(uint[] uidList, int uidNumber, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> setSubscribeVideoBlocklistEx( {required List<int> uidList, required int uidNumber, required RtcConnection connection});

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp electron unity rn flutter cs

section.p: 方法成功调用时，无返回值；方法调用失败时，会抛出 异常，你需要捕获异常并进行处理。详见了解详情和解决建议。

li.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs

ul.li: < 0: 方法调用失败。详见了解详情和解决建议。
